items.text:
As Aell tries to focus on his conduit, you remind him to focus on just
what is needed, not what is possible. Your quiet, firm voice helps
center him, and he slowly but surely begins to reach out into the sky.
Clouds skid across the horizon as the weather of the Valley begins to
change.

Replace the weather card with another weather card of your choice. It
maintains the same number of tokens. Then, discard Aell.
